summary: A new alternate appearance for Balgruuf the Great, Jarl of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
I personally think vanilla Balgruuf the Greater looks a bit goofy and not very intimidating for a man with the title of Jarl of Whiterun and someone who holds considerable power over the common folk of his Jarldom. Plus he also looks quite skinny, not exactly a man blessed by Talos with the physique of a TES Nord!

To that end, I have edited Balgruuf\\\'s appearance into what I consider to be a much more normal, more manly and overall better appearance of the Jarl of Whiterun. 

The change isn\\\'t total, much of Balgruuf remains the same, his eyes and facial features/structure have been left unchanged, his other features have, I feel, been improved, although, as with my other mods, I\\\'m sure many will disagree, and those who do are free to not download it. That said, I hope those who do download this small mod are pleased with the new appearance of Balgruuf.
author: Sky999
